option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_title" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tab_diary" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/diary_search_input" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/diary_title" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/diary_search_edit" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/diary_search_hint" android:imeOptions="actionSearch" android:inputType="text" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_filter_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_filter_label" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/diary_search_input" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButtonToggleGroup android:id="@+id/diary_mood_filters" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/diary_filter_label" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:singleSelection="true">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_all" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_all" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_happy" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_happy" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_calm" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_calm" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_neutral" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_neutral" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_sad" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_sad" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_angry" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_angry" /> </com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButtonToggleGroup>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/diary_list" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/diary_mood_filters" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/diary_empty_state" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/diary_mood_filters" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_empty_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_empty_title" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_empty_subtitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" android:text="@string/diary_empty_subtitle" /> </LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton android:id="@+id/diary_add_fab" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:contentDescription="@string/diary_add_entry" app:srcCompat="@android:drawable/ic_input_add" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_title" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tab_diary" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/diary_search_input" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/diary_title" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/diary_search_edit" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/diary_search_hint" android:imeOptions="actionSearch" android:inputType="text" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_filter_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_filter_label" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/diary_search_input" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<HorizontalScrollView android:id="@+id/diary_mood_scroll" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:scrollbars="none" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/diary_filter_label" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButtonToggleGroup android:id="@+id/diary_mood_filters" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:singleSelection="true">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_all" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_all" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_happy" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_happy" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_calm" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_calm" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_neutral" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_neutral" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_sad" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_sad" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_filter_angry" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_angry" /> </com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButtonToggleGroup> </HorizontalScrollView>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/diary_list" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/diary_mood_scroll" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/diary_empty_state" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/diary_mood_scroll" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_empty_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_empty_title" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_empty_subtitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" android:text="@string/diary_empty_subtitle" /> </LinearLayout>
<com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton android:id="@+id/diary_add_fab" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:contentDescription="@string/diary_add_entry" app:srcCompat="@android:drawable/ic_input_add" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_title_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_edit_add_title" android:textStyle="bold" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/diary_edit_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/diary_edit_title_hint" android:inputType="text" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_content_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_edit_content" android:textStyle="bold" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/diary_edit_content" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/diary_edit_content_hint" android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:minLines="5" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_tags_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_edit_tags" android:textStyle="bold" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/diary_edit_tags" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/diary_edit_tags_hint" android:inputType="text" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_edit_mood" android:textStyle="bold" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButtonToggleGroup android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_group" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" app:singleSelection="true">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_all" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_all" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_happy" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_happy" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_calm" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_calm" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_neutral" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_neutral" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_sad" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_sad" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_angry" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_angry" /> </com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButtonToggleGroup>
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_time_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_edit_time" android:textStyle="bold" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_time_text" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="2026-02-24 20:00" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_time_button" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_edit_pick_time" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:gravity="end" android:orientation="horizontal">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_delete_button" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_edit_delete" android:visibility="gone" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_save_button" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_edit_save" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_title_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_edit_add_title" android:textStyle="bold" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/diary_edit_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/diary_edit_title_hint" android:inputType="text" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_content_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_edit_content" android:textStyle="bold" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/diary_edit_content" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/diary_edit_content_hint" android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:minLines="5" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_tags_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_edit_tags" android:textStyle="bold" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/diary_edit_tags" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/diary_edit_tags_hint" android:inputType="text" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_edit_mood" android:textStyle="bold" />
<HorizontalScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:fillViewport="true" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:scrollbars="none">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButtonToggleGroup android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_group" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:singleSelection="true">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_all" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_all" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_happy" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_happy" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_calm" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_calm" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_neutral" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_neutral" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_sad" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_sad" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_mood_angry" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_filter_mood_angry" /> </com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButtonToggleGroup> </HorizontalScrollView>
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_time_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_edit_time" android:textStyle="bold" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="6dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:id="@+id/diary_edit_time_text" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="2026-02-24 20:00" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_time_button" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_edit_pick_time" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:gravity="end" android:orientation="horizontal">
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_delete_button" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/diary_edit_delete" android:visibility="gone" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/diary_edit_save_button" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="@string/diary_edit_save" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <resources> <string name="app_name">海媚</string> <string name="hello_android">Hello Android!</string> <string name="tab_home">Home</string> <string name="tab_profile">Profile</string> <string name="tab_diary">Diary</string> <string name="tab_plans">Plans</string> <string name="home_placeholder">Home overview will appear here.</string> <string name="profile_placeholder">Profile editing will appear here.</string> <string name="diary_placeholder">Diary list will appear here.</string> <string name="plans_placeholder">Plans list will appear here.</string> <string name="home_name_placeholder">她的昵称</string> <string name="home_birthday_placeholder">距离她生日还有 0 天</string> <string name="home_zodiac_placeholder">星座</string> <string name="home_zodiac_traits_placeholder">点击完善她的资料</string> <string name="home_latest_diary_title">最近一条日记</string> <string name="home_latest_diary_placeholder">还没有日记，去写第一条吧</string> <string name="home_add_diary">新增日记</string> <string name="profile_title">她的资料</string> <string name="profile_name_label">昵称/姓名</string> <string name="profile_save_name">保存昵称</string> <string name="profile_birthday_label">生日</string> <string name="profile_birthday_placeholder">未设置</string> <string name="profile_birthday_edit">修改生日</string> <string name="profile_zodiac_label">星座</string> <string name="profile_zodiac_placeholder">未计算</string> <string name="profile_zodiac_traits_label">星座特点</string> <string name="profile_save_traits">保存特点</string> <string name="profile_edit">编辑</string> <string name="profile_done">完成</string> <string name="profile_name_display">姓名：-</string> <string name="profile_birthday_display">生日：-</string> <string name="profile_zodiac_display">星座：-</string> <string name="profile_traits_display">特点：-</string> <string name="profile_name_value">姓名：%1$s</string> <string name="profile_birthday_value">生日：%1$s</string> <string name="profile_zodiac_value">星座：%1$s</string> <string name="profile_traits_value">特点：%1$s</string> <string name="profile_edit_entry">编辑资料</string> <string name="profile_lunar_birthday_display">农历生日：-</string> <string name="profile_lunar_birthday_value">农历生日：%1$s</string> <string name="home_birthday_solar_placeholder">公历生日：-</string> <string name="home_birthday_lunar_placeholder">农历生日：-</string> <string name="home_birthday_countdown_solar_placeholder">公历生日：还有 0 天</string> <string name="home_birthday_countdown_lunar_placeholder">农历生日：还有 0 天</string> <string name="profile_lunar_fixed_note">农历生日为固定值</string> <string name="diary_search_hint">搜索标题、内容或标签</string> <string name="diary_filter_label">心情筛选</string> <string
